duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and implement company-wide safety programs for ground-up and tenant improvement general construction projects.
Train and oversee new construction projects to enforce safety procedures for active employees.
Manage and oversee all Safety reports as required by the Authority.
Monitor compliance to all current OSHA requirements and Owner Controlled Insurance Program (OCIP) requirements.
Accompany OSHA representatives on-site walks for observation and recording.
Confirm that New Hire Safety Orientation and online safety training courses are completed.
Lead safety meetings and curriculum, train and develop safety staff for job site safety.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Safety, Construction Management, or related field (Master's preferred)
